channel.title: Aba on COTTON
channel.description: Recent content in Aba on COTTON

item.title: GhCPK84
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D10G2029 Gene Symbol: GhCPK84 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Comparative phosphoproteomic analysis reveals that phosphorylation of sucrose synthase GhSUS2 by Ca2+-dependent protein kinases GhCPK84/GhCPK93 affects cotton fiber development.

item.title: GhCPK93
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D12G2743 Gene Symbol: GhCPK93 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Comparative phosphoproteomic analysis reveals that phosphorylation of sucrose synthase GhSUS2 by Ca2+-dependent protein kinases GhCPK84/GhCPK93 affects cotton fiber development.

item.title: GhCUC2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhCUC2 Gene Name: CUP-SHAPED COTYLEDON2 Genome: reference genome TM-1 (AD1) genome NAU-NBI Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: The miR164-GhCUC2-GhBRC1 module regulates plant architecture through abscisic acid in cotton.

item.title: GhDREB1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhDREB1 Gene Name: DREB-like transcription factor Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Cotton GhDREB1 increases plant tolerance to low temperature and is negatively regulated by gibberellic acid.

item.title: GhGLU19A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_A04G0109 Gene Symbol: GhGLU19A Gene Name: Glucanase 19 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Suppression of GhGLU19 encoding β-1,3-glucanase promotes seed germination in cotton.

item.title: GhGLU19D
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D05G3612 Gene Symbol: GhGLU19D Gene Name: Glucanase 19 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Suppression of GhGLU19 encoding β-1,3-glucanase promotes seed germination in cotton.

item.title: GhMAP3K62
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_A10G0115 Gene Symbol: GhMAP3K62 Gene Name: Genome: genomes of G.

item.title: GhMKK16
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D11G0703 Gene Symbol: GhMKK16 Gene Name: Genome: genomes of G.

item.title: GhMKK3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhMKK3 Gene Name: Mitogen-Activated Protein Kinase Kinase 3 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: The Cotton Mitogen-Activated Protein Kinase Kinase 3 (GhMKK3) Functions in Drought Tolerance by Regulating Stomatal Responses and Root Growth.

item.title: GhMPK32
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D05G1825 Gene Symbol: GhMPK32 Gene Name: Genome: genomes of G.

item.title: GhMT3a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhMT3a Gene Name: Metallothionein-like Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Cotton metallothionein GhMT3a, a reactive oxygen species scavenger, increased tolerance against abiotic stress in transgenic tobacco and yeast.

item.title: GhNAC83
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: GlaUn057212 Gene Symbol: GhNAC83 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: GhNAC83 inhibits corm dormancy release by regulating ABA signaling and cytokinin biosynthesis in Gladiolus hybridus.

item.title: GhWRKY17
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhWRKY17 Gene Name: WRKY transcription factor 17 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: The Cotton WRKY Transcription Factor GhWRKY17 Functions in Drought and Salt Stress in Transgenic Nicotiana benthamiana Through ABA Signaling and the Modulation of Reactive Oxygen Species Production.
